Passaic.Glendale Cemetery, Bloomfield:
Glendale Cemetery is a cemetery located in Bloomfield and Belleville townships in the U.S. state of New Jersey.


== Notable burials ==
Mule Suttles (1900-1966) Negro league baseball player who was inducted into the Baseball Hall of Fame in 2006.
Sarah Vaughan (1924-1990), jazz singer.
